description.lang: Aeon Labs Door/ Window Sensor Gen5 is a smart Z-Wave sensor that can detect the status of door/window's open/close in real time. Its a security Z-Wave device that supports security encryption. Also it supports the Over the Air Firmware Updating that allows you wirelessly update its firmware if needs. It can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from manufacturers and/or other applications.

Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate. The sensor binary report, basic set or notification report command can be sent in this group when the Sensor is triggered.

name.lang: Which value of the Sensor Binary Report will be sent when the door is Opened/Closed.

description.lang: To set which value of the Sensor Binary Report will be sent when the door is Opened/Closed.
Sensor Binary Report =0xFF when the door is Closed, Sensor Binary Report= 0x00 when the door is opened.
Sensor Binary Report= 0x00 when the door is closed, Sensor Binary Report=0xFF when the door is opened.

name.lang: Set the interval time of battery report.

description.lang: Set the interval time of battery report.Note:1, if the value is less than 10, the time unit is second.If the value is more than 10, the time unit is 4 minutes, which means if the value is more than 10 and less than 240, the interval time is 4 minutes. If the value is more than 240 and less than 480, the interval is 8 minutes.2, if the current battery report falls below the low battery value (configurable parameter 39), it will send battery report=0xFF.
The range of interval can be set to 0 to 2147483647.

name.lang: To configure which sensor report will be sent when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

description.lang: To configure which sensor report will be sent when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.
Basic Set CC is selected.
Sensor Binary Report CC is selected.
Basic Set CC and Sensor Binary Report CC are selected.

name.lang: Enable/disable wake up 10 minutes when re-power on the Sensor.

description.lang: Enable/disable wake up 10 minutes when re-power on the Sensor.
Disable.
Enable.
Reset the Sensor.
Reset to default settings.
Reset to default settings and excluded from the network.

name.lang: Which value of the Basic Set will be sent when the door is Opened/Closed.

description.lang: To set which value of the Basic Set will be sent when the door is Opened/Closed.
Basic Set=0xFF when the door is Closed, Basic Set=0x00 when the door is opened.
Basic Set 0x00 when the door is Closed, Basic Set= 0xFF when the door is opened.
Set the low battery value.(10% to 50%).
The range of low battery value can be set to 10% to 50%.
